name: The Singularity (Censere)
description:
It's the far future, and a AI Overlord has taken over the virtual realm! It's up to you to gather info about this new threat and put a stop to the singularity once and for all!

(Created for a group project) 

(Read Notes before playing for optimal gameplay experience)

Controls:

WASD - Movement, hold SHIFT to sprint

LMB - Shoot Gun

SPACE - Jump

Notes/Bugs: 

-Make sure to kill all the enemies in the second stage, or else the boss won't spawn.

-Enable Fullscreen before playing as not doing so will mess up the UI (i don't know why it does that)

-Slight audio problem when buying ammo in the shop

-There are also some collision issues with the buildings in the second stage so theres that
